drug.name: Pyronaridine
drug.description: Pyronaridine has been investigated for the treatment of Malaria.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as 4-aminoquinolines. These are organic compounds containing an amino group attached to the 4-position of a quinoline ring system.

drug-interaction.name: Artemether
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of QTc prolongation can be increased when Pyronaridine is combined with Artemether.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of QTc prolongation can be increased when Pyronaridine is combined with Lumefantrine.
